description: This file provides utility functions for handling feature flags and authentication settings in the Weekly Report Frontend project. It includes functions to safely parse JSON, check if authentication is disabled based on environment variables, and retrieve feature flags as an object.

methods.name: safeParseJSON(str, fallback)
methods.description: Safely parses a JSON string, returning a fallback value if parsing fails or input is invalid.

methods.name: isAuthDisabled()
methods.description: Determines if authentication is disabled based on the environment variable, case-insensitive string 'true'.

methods.name: getFeatureFlags()
methods.description: Retrieves feature flags as an object parsed from the environment variable, with a default empty object on failure.
